summary.span: 命名空间包含控制和提供代理功能的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that control and provide functionality for proxies.

summary.span: 代理是作为远程对象映像的本地对象。

span.span: A proxy is a local object that is an image of a remote object.

summary.span: 代理使客户端可以跨远程处理边界访问对象。

span.span: Proxies enable clients to access objects across remoting boundaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最重要的类之一命名空间是类，其中提供的基本功能的所有远程处理代理，并可用于创建自定义代理。One of the most important classes of the namespace is the class, which provides the base functionality for all remoting proxies, and can be used to create custom proxies.
